name: GoAnimate
overview: GoAnimate is a platform that allows people to express themselves through animation without having to learn to draw or install any software.

milestones.description: Lizz Winstead partners with GoAnimate.com to create election inspired animations
milestones.source_text:
Goanimate.com today announces a content-based partnership with Daily Show Co-Creator Lizz Winstead.  Using Goanimate.com software, Winstead will write and produce election-inspired animations for upcoming episodes of Shoot The Messenger, a NYC based comedy troupe starring members from The Daily Show, Air America Radio, National Lampoon, Upright Citizen Brigade, Second City, and the Huffington Post.

â€œGoAnimate is a great creative tool that allows me to tap into the exciting world of animation without any background or training,â€ said Lizz, â€œthe software eliminates the need to be an artist or a computer person, you just need an idea. Goanimate.com is an amazing web-site that allows me to express my political commentary and observations and, at the same time, help cultivate a new generation of comedic talent who can use the software to branch into an area of expression to which few have had access.â€
